original_text: Then she let them down by a rope through the window, for her house was built into the city wall, so that she lived in the wall.
korean_text: 라합이 그들을 창문에서 줄로 달아 내리니 그의 집이 성벽 위에 있으므로 그가 성벽 위에 거주하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Then she let them down by a rope
for her house was built into the city wall
so that she lived in the wall
